biography: Mikael, a celebrated member of Kurk Golf, is known for his thoughtful approach to the game. While some might see him as reserved, those who know him well understand that his quiet demeanor masks a fierce competitive spirit and a deep love for the sport.

Mikael has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on one occasion, bringing with him an air of understated determination. Although he is considered as retired from Hector events, his impact on the tournament has been notable.

As a respected figure within the golfing community, Mikael's presence is missed as he is not participating in Hector Trophée 2025. However, the world of golf knows well that the situation may still change before the start of the event, which means that there remains a possibility that Mikael's fans may see him on the golf course again.
